role.argrole: entity arg0 holds in curled up position

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 上面) ) (VP (DVP (VP (ADVP (AD 十分)) (VP (VA 立体))) (DEV 的)) (VP (VV 刻) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 只))) (ADJP (JJ 夔)) (NP (NN 龙) )) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 蜷抱) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 两) (CLP (M 颗))) (NP (NN 海贝) )))))))
